Zoom in and select a prototype block.

To share an idea, please zoom in and select a prototype block. We're gathering feedback based on the following categories:

  •  Engage with other communities Opportunities to engage with other communities on Market Street.
  •  Relax, socialize and enjoy Opportunities to relax, socialize and enjoy.
  •  Tell my neighborhood's story Ways to tell my neighborhood's story.
  •  Better navigation Better navigation along Market Street.
  •  Underrepresented populations Make the area more inviting to underrepresented populations.
  •  Other Other opportunities.
